parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language in which you want to display the results. Valid values: zh and en. zh indicates Chinese, which is the default value. en indicates English.

parameters.name: BehaviorType
parameters.description:
The type of the web fallback behavior.

0: returns the specified content.

1: redirects to the specified page.

parameters.name: BodyEncoding
parameters.description:
The encoding format.

0: normal text

1: JSON

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the throttling rule.

0: disables the throttling rule.

1: enables the throttling rule.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: ResponseContentBody
parameters.description: The HTTP text to be returned.

parameters.name: ResponseRedirectUrl
parameters.description: The address to be redirected to.

parameters.name: RouteName
parameters.description: The name of the routing rule.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: The overall queries per second (QPS) threshold.
